title: "Egyptian Magic" app

for.name: For the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden of Leiden

tasks: In charge of the visual design of the touch screen (using the current communication's guideline)
Responsible for the production of the interactive touch screen
projectDescription: The project was made by Elimak in collaboration with InfoFilm
It was displayed in the museum of Leiden (The Netherlands) during the exhibition
It was designed specifically for touch-screens
The application ran for 3 months long without discontinuation
team: Roger Busschots, from InfoFilm, collected the texts and realized the video
I created and integrated the application at the Museum
